by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.impl

Class OrderReceiverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.OrderReceiver
      • by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.impl.OrderReceiverImpl

  • public class OrderReceiverImpl
extends OrderReceiver
    Realizes validation of user's order requests and if they are valid sends them for further processing.
